name: Kupay One-Click Checkout for WooCommerce
author: Kupay

sections.description:
Boost your shop’s conversion rate by allowing your customers to buy with just one click.

Access Kupay and register your store to get the benefits of a frictionless and headless checkout!

Requirements

  • WooCommerce 5.3.0 or higher is required.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Kupay One Click Checkout for WooCommerce is out now!

1.1

  • Enable One-Click Checkout for variation productions.

1.1.2

  • Enable css custom fields for Kupay button on PDP, Cart and Checkout.
  • Shipping cost are now being calculated according to region and flat/free rate.

1.1.3

  • Enable coupon discounts applied on the cart and checkout pages.

1.1.4

  • Minor bug-fixes.

1.1.5

  • Enable option for disable button on PDP.

1.1.6

  • Enable options for enabling/disabling button on product, cart and checkout pages.
  • Minor bug-fixes.

1.1.7

  • Enable multiple delivery modes functionality for stores with dynamic delivery.

1.1.8

  • Minor bug-fixes.

1.1.9

  • Allow refund using Stripe Connect ID;
  • Minor bug-fixes.

1.1.10

  • Minor bug-fixes.

1.1.11

  • Minor bug-fixes.

1.1.12

  • Minor bug-fixes.
